Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Cygnar::
       He lands outside of the Maximal base and transforms back into his 
robot mode.  He raises his hands above his head in a universal sign of peace. 
 He opens a comlink to the base.  "Hello Maximals.  My name is Cygnar.  I 
have been sent by Galvatron to negotiate with you."  He waits for a reply.

--part1_16a.108eba62.2a64eedb_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>::Cygnar::
<BR>       He lands outside of the Maximal base and transforms back into his robot mode.  He raises his hands above his head in a universal sign of peace.  He opens a comlink to the base.  "Hello Maximals.  My name is Cygnar.  I have been sent by Galvatron to negotiate with you."  He waits for a reply.</FONT></HTML>
